attributes.action: Abandon plans to host the 2012 Olympic Games in the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans to host the 2012 Olympic Games should be abandoned because of the exorbitant cost.  The expenditure on staging the Games will not be recouped, as the politicians claim, neither will it offer any significant benefits to the majority of the population in terms of investment and jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
